definition: to go on a hunting expedition

sentences.english: Humans lived as roaming hunters and gatherers for most of their existence.
sentences.chinese: 当时的人类群体绝大部分是以游猎部落形式存在的。

sentences.english: A big-game hunter went on safari with his wife and mother-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 一位职业猎人带着妻子和岳母一块去游猎。

sentences.english: These trips are called balloon safaris.
sentences.chinese: 这种旅行被称为气球游猎。

sentences.english: Burdick admitted that the safaris were just a hoax.
sentences.chinese: 迪克承认游猎玩意只是骗局。

sentences.english: You should put on your safari suit to go hunting.
sentences.chinese: 打猎你该穿上游猎便装。

sentences.english: The Waorani are a semi-nomadic people who hunt to feed themselves.
sentences.chinese: Waorani人是半游牧民族，以游猎为生。

definition: nomadic/to move about in search of pasture/to rove around as a nomad
fishing and hunting/fig. to loot/to plunder
Xianbei or Xianbi, group of northern nomadic peoples
to go on or send a punitive expedition
Outer Mongolia (lit. north of the Gobi Desert)
